title: PBE store won't open
body: So ik riot is fixing the PBE store but any possible way to tell us when it will be fixed?

replies.body: NA Help & Support doesn't typically help out with PBE related issues, since we don't really have much visibility on that servers info. Your best bet is either to post over on the PBE boards or check the [**Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3L7n38ZT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-16T03:04:30.337+0000)
>
> NA Help & Support doesn't typically help out with PBE related issues, since we don't really have much visibility on that servers info. Your best bet is either to post over on the PBE boards or check the [**Status Page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).

Ok thank you
